Bongsu(DocumentaryAboutPencakSilat).name: BONGSU (Documentary about Pencak Silat)
Bongsu(DocumentaryAboutPencakSilat).summary: This documentary, "BONGSU," explores Pencak Silat, a Malaysian martial art, through the insights of Dr. Azli, a silat master, and the training and competition experiences of fighters.

FightMasters|Silat|Silap|Malaysia|Malay|.name: Fight Masters | Silat | Silap | Malaysia | Malay | Melayu
FightMasters|Silat|Silap|Malaysia|Malay|.summary: The video, "Fight Masters | Silat," explores Silat, a martial art from Southeast Asia, focusing on Joel Champ, an American fighter aiming to achieve a third stripe on his black belt in Silat Gayong in Malaysia. Joel undergoes various challenges, including an ancient initiation ceremony involving boiling coconut oil and fire and rigorous training in deadly Silat techniques like "SA Mau" and "Siligi". He also learns to wield traditional weapons such as the Curus, the Corumbent, and the Chindai, a sarong used as a weapon.

FightQuestPencakSilat.name: Fight Quest Pencak Silat
FightQuestPencakSilat.summary: This video follows professional mixed martial arts fighter Jimmy Smith and Iraq war veteran Doug Anderson as they travel to Bandung, West Java, Indonesia, to train in the traditional martial art of Pencak Silat. Their goal is to prepare for a three-round battle against local Pencak Silat champions.
